source:
| **Chapter**                   | 2:  Simple compartmental models                       |
| ----------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| **Computational Note**        | 2.x: Basic compartmental models                       |
| **Package prerequisites**     | None                                                  |


# Basic compartmental models

## SIRD model

The SIRD model is governed by the following system of ODEs:

We assume $R_0 = 2.5$ and $\tau = 8$.

From this follows that $\gamma = \tau^{-1}$ and $\beta = R_0 \gamma$.

We furthermore assume a mortality fraction (Case Fatality Ratio) of 20%, i.e. $\mu = 0.2$.

import numpy as np
from scipy.integrate import solve_ivp
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

COLORS = {"S": "#2f4b7c",
          "E": "#ffa600",
          "I": "#f95d6a",
          "R": "#a05195",
          "D": "#003f5c",
          "C": "#ff7c43",
          "X": "#665191",
          "Y": "#d45087"}

def deriv(t, y, beta, gamma, mu):
    S, I, R, D = y
    dSdt = -beta * S * I
    dIdt = beta * S * I - gamma * I
    dRdt = gamma * (1 - mu) * I
    dDdt = gamma * mu * I
    return dSdt, dIdt, dRdt, dDdt
res = solve_ivp(fun=deriv, t_span = (0, 100), y0=y_0, args=(beta, gamma, mu), max_step=1)

S, I, R, D = res.y

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(4, 4))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(res.t, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Susceptible")
ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Infectious")
ax.plot(res.t, R + D, color=COLORS["R"], alpha = 0.6, lw=2, label="Total removed")

ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, D, R + D, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.15, label="Recovered")
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, D, color=COLORS["D"], alpha=0.15, label="Deceased")

ax.set_xlabel('Time (days)')
ax.set_ylabel("Fraction of proportion in compartment")
ax.set_ylim(0, 1.0)
ax.grid(b=True, which='major', c='w', lw=2, ls='-')

for spine in ("top", "right"):
    ax.spines[spine].set_visible(False)

legend = ax.legend()
legend.get_frame().set_alpha(0.5)
plt.legend(title='', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.5), loc="lower center", ncol=2, frameon=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(bottom=0.25)

plt.savefig("sird_integral_small.pdf")
plt.show()
## SIR + population dynamics

def deriv(t, y, beta, gamma, mu, phi):
    S, I, R, Sp, Ip, Rp = y
    dSdt = - (beta * S * I) - (mu * S) + (phi * (S + I + R))
    dIdt = beta * S * I - gamma * I - mu * I
    dRdt = gamma * I - mu * R

    dSpdt = -beta * Sp * Ip
    dIpdt = beta * Sp * Ip - gamma * Ip
    dRpdt = gamma * Ip

    return dSdt, dIdt, dRdt, dSpdt, dIpdt, dRpdt

PERIOD = 200

res = solve_ivp(fun=deriv, t_span = (0, PERIOD), y0=y_0, args=(beta, gamma, mu, phi), method="BDF")

S, I, R, Sp, Ip, Rp = res.y

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(10, 10))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(res.t, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Susceptible")
ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Infectious")
ax.plot(res.t, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha = 0.6, lw=2, label="Total removed")

ax.plot(res.t, Sp, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.7, lw=1, linestyle="dotted", label="Susceptible (w/o PD)")
ax.plot(res.t, Ip, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.7, lw=1, linestyle="dotted", label="Infectious (w/o PD)")
ax.plot(res.t, Rp, color=COLORS["R"], alpha = 0.7, lw=1, linestyle="dotted", label="Total removed (w/o PD)")


ax.fill_between(res.t, S, Sp, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.33)
ax.fill_between(res.t, I, Ip, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.33)
ax.fill_between(res.t, R, Rp, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.33)

ax.set_xlabel('Time (days)')
ax.set_ylabel("Fraction of proportion in compartment")
ax.grid(b=True, which='major', c='w', lw=2, ls='-')

for spine in ("top", "right"):
    ax.spines[spine].set_visible(False)

legend = ax.legend()
legend.get_frame().set_alpha(0.5)
plt.legend(title='', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.2125), loc="lower center", ncol=2, frameon=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(bottom=0.25)

plt.savefig("sir_with_demographics_integral_small.pdf")
plt.show()
## SI model

I_0 = 1e-2
S_0 = 1 - I_0

y_0 = (S_0, I_0)
R0 = 4
tau = 6
gamma = 1/tau
beta = R0 * gamma

def deriv(t, y, beta, gamma):
    S, I = y
    
    dSdt = - beta * S * I + gamma * I
    dIdt = beta * S * I - gamma * I

    return dSdt, dIdt
res = solve_ivp(fun=deriv, t_span = (0, 60), y0=y_0, args=(beta, gamma), max_step=1)

S, I = res.y

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(4, 4))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(res.t, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Susceptible")
ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Infectious")

ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.15)

ax.set_xlabel('Time (days)')
ax.set_ylabel("Fraction of proportion in compartment")
ax.set_ylim(0, 1.0)
ax.grid(b=True, which='major', c='w', lw=2, ls='-')

for spine in ("top", "right"):
    ax.spines[spine].set_visible(False)

legend = ax.legend()
legend.get_frame().set_alpha(0.5)
plt.legend(title='', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.4), loc="lower center", ncol=2, frameon=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(bottom=0.25)

plt.savefig("si_integral_small.pdf")
plt.show()
## Waning immunity (SIRS)

I_0 = 1e-2
S_0 = 1 - I_0
R_0 = 0

y_0 = (S_0, I_0, R_0)
R0 = 2.5
tau = 4
gamma = 1/tau
tau_R = 50
omega = 1/tau_R
beta = R0 * gamma

def deriv(t, y, beta, gamma, omega):
    S, I, R = y
    
    dSdt = - beta * S * I + omega * R
    dIdt = beta * S * I - gamma * I
    dRdt = gamma * I - omega * R

    return dSdt, dIdt, dRdt
res = solve_ivp(fun=deriv, t_span = (0, 150), y0=y_0, args=(beta, gamma, omega), max_step=1)

S, I, R = res.y

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(4, 4))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(res.t, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Susceptible")
ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Infectious")
ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Recovered")

ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.15)

ax.set_xlabel('Time (days)')
ax.set_ylabel("Fraction of proportion in compartment")
ax.set_ylim(0, 1.0)
ax.grid(b=True, which='major', c='w', lw=2, ls='-')
ax.vlines([13, 90], ymin=0, ymax=1, linestyles="dashed", lw=0.6, color="k")

for spine in ("top", "right"):
    ax.spines[spine].set_visible(False)

legend = ax.legend()
legend.get_frame().set_alpha(0.5)
plt.legend(title='', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.4), loc="lower center", ncol=2, frameon=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(bottom=0.25)

plt.savefig("sirs_integral_small.pdf")
plt.show()

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(4, 4))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(S, I, color=COLORS["X"])
ax.set_ylabel("Fraction of infectious")
ax.set_xlabel("Fraction of susceptible")

plt.savefig("sirs_phase_portrait.pdf")
plt.show()
## SEIR

I_0 = 1e-2
S_0 = 1 - I_0
R_0, E_0 = 0, 0

y_0 = (S_0, E_0, I_0, R_0)


R0 = 6
tau = 12
gamma = 1/tau
beta = R0 * gamma
sigma = 0.1

def deriv(t, y, beta, gamma, sigma):
    S, E, I, R = y
    
    dSdt = - beta * S * I
    dEdt = beta * S * I - sigma * E
    dIdt = sigma * E - gamma * I
    dRdt = gamma * I

    return dSdt, dEdt, dIdt, dRdt
res = solve_ivp(fun=deriv, t_span = (0, 80), y0=y_0, args=(beta, gamma, sigma), max_step=1)

S, E, I, R = res.y

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(4, 4))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(res.t, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.2, lw=2, label="Susceptible")
ax.plot(res.t, E, color=COLORS["E"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Exposed")
ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Infectious")
ax.plot(res.t, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.2, lw=2, label="Recovered")

ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.02)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, E, color=COLORS["E"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.02)

ax.set_xlabel('Time (days)')
ax.set_ylabel("Fraction of proportion in compartment")
ax.set_ylim(0, 1.0)
ax.grid(b=True, which='major', c='w', lw=2, ls='-')

for spine in ("top", "right"):
    ax.spines[spine].set_visible(False)

legend = ax.legend()
legend.get_frame().set_alpha(0.5)
plt.legend(title='', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.4), loc="lower center", ncol=2, frameon=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(bottom=0.25)

plt.savefig("seir_integral_small.pdf")
plt.show()
## SIRC

I_0 = 1e-2
S_0 = 1 - I_0
R_0, C_0 = 0, 0

y_0 = (S_0, I_0, R_0, C_0)


R0 = 6
tau = 12
gamma = 1/tau
beta = R0 * gamma
omega = 0.005
theta = 0.25

def deriv(t, y, beta, gamma, omega, theta):
    S, I, R, C = y
    
    dSdt = - beta * S * (I + C)
    dIdt = beta * S * (I + C) - gamma * I
    dRdt = (1 - theta) * gamma * I + omega * C
    dCdt = theta * gamma * I - omega * C

    return dSdt, dIdt, dRdt, dCdt
res = solve_ivp(fun=deriv, t_span = (0, 80), y0=y_0, args=(beta, gamma, omega, theta), max_step=1)

S, I, R, C = res.y

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(4, 4))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(res.t, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.2, lw=2, label="Susceptible")
ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Infectious")
ax.plot(res.t, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.2, lw=2, label="Recovered")
ax.plot(res.t, C, color=COLORS["C"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Carrier")

ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.02)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.02)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, C, color=COLORS["C"], alpha=0.15)

ax.set_xlabel('Time (days)')
ax.set_ylabel("Fraction of proportion in compartment")
ax.set_ylim(0, 1.0)
ax.grid(b=True, which='major', c='w', lw=2, ls='-')

for spine in ("top", "right"):
    ax.spines[spine].set_visible(False)

legend = ax.legend()
legend.get_frame().set_alpha(0.5)
plt.legend(title='', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.4), loc="lower center", ncol=2, frameon=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(bottom=0.25)

plt.savefig("sirc_integral_small.pdf")
plt.show()
## SIRC with reduced carrier transmissibility

I_0 = 1e-2
S_0 = 1 - I_0
R_0, C_0 = 0, 0

y_0 = (S_0, I_0, R_0, C_0)


R0 = 6
tau = 12
gamma = 1/tau
beta = R0 * gamma
omega = 0.005
theta = 0.25
alpha = 0.1

def deriv(t, y, beta, gamma, omega, theta, alpha):
    S, I, R, C = y
    
    dSdt = - beta * S * (I + alpha * C)
    dIdt = beta * S * (I + alpha * C) - gamma * I
    dRdt = (1 - theta) * gamma * I + omega * C
    dCdt = theta * gamma * I - omega * C

    return dSdt, dIdt, dRdt, dCdt
res = solve_ivp(fun=deriv, t_span = (0, 80), y0=y_0, args=(beta, gamma, omega, theta, alpha), max_step=1)

S, I, R, C = res.y

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(4, 4))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(res.t, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.2, lw=2, label="Susceptible")
ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Infectious")
ax.plot(res.t, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.2, lw=2, label="Recovered")
ax.plot(res.t, C, color=COLORS["C"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Carrier")

ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.02)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.02)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, C, color=COLORS["C"], alpha=0.15)

ax.set_xlabel('Time (days)')
ax.set_ylabel("Fraction of proportion in compartment")
ax.set_ylim(0, 1.0)
ax.grid(b=True, which='major', c='w', lw=2, ls='-')

for spine in ("top", "right"):
    ax.spines[spine].set_visible(False)

legend = ax.legend()
legend.get_frame().set_alpha(0.5)
plt.legend(title='', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.4), loc="lower center", ncol=2, frameon=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(bottom=0.25)

plt.savefig("sirc_integral_with_alpha_small.pdf")
plt.show()
## Symbolic SEIR

I_0 = 1e-2
S_0 = 1 - I_0
E_0, R_0 = 0, 0

y_0 = (S_0, E_0, I_0, R_0)


R0 = 6
tau = 12
gamma = 1/tau
beta = R0 * gamma
mu = 0.01
sigma = 0.2

def deriv(t, y, beta, gamma, sigma):
    S, E, I, R = y
    
    dSdt = - beta * S * I
    dEdt = beta * S * I - sigma * E
    dIdt = sigma * E - gamma * I
    dRdt = gamma * I

    return dSdt, dEdt, dIdt, dRdt
res = solve_ivp(fun=deriv, t_span = (0, 80), y0=y_0, args=(beta, gamma, sigma), max_step=1)

S, E, I, R = res.y

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(4, 4))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(res.t, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.2, lw=2, label="Susceptible")
ax.plot(res.t, E, color=COLORS["E"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Exposed")
ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, label="Infectious")
ax.plot(res.t, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.2, lw=2, label="Recovered")

ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, S, color=COLORS["S"], alpha=0.02)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, E, color=COLORS["E"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.15)
ax.fill_between(res.t, 0, R, color=COLORS["R"], alpha=0.02)

ax.set_xlabel('Time (days)')
ax.set_ylabel("Fraction of proportion in compartment")
ax.set_ylim(0, 1.0)
ax.grid(b=True, which='major', c='w', lw=2, ls='-')

for spine in ("top", "right"):
    ax.spines[spine].set_visible(False)

legend = ax.legend()
legend.get_frame().set_alpha(0.5)
plt.legend(title='', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.4), loc="lower center", ncol=2, frameon=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(bottom=0.25)

plt.savefig("seir_integral_small.pdf")
plt.show()
from sympy import *
s, e, i, r, beta, phi, sigma, mu, gamma = symbols("s e i r beta phi sigma mu gamma")
init_printing(use_unicode=True)
X = Matrix([[e], [i]])
Y = Matrix([[s], [r]])

Fvec = Matrix([[beta * i], [0]])
Vvec = Matrix([[(mu + sigma) * e], 
               [- sigma * e + (gamma + mu) * i]])
F = Fvec.jacobian(X)
F
V = Vvec.jacobian(X)
V
(F * V.inv()).eigenvals()

I_0 = 1e-2
S_0 = 1 - I_0
R_0, E_0 = 0, 0

y_0 = (S_0, I_0, R_0, S_0, I_0, R_0)


R0 = 6
tau = 12
gamma = 1/tau
beta = R0 * gamma
sigma = 0.1
regn = 0.003

def deriv(t, y, beta, gamma, regn):
    S, I, R, Sn, In, Rn = y

    dSdt = - beta * S * I + (regn * (S + I + R))
    dIdt = beta * S * I - gamma * I - (regn * (S + I + R))
    dRdt = gamma * I

    dSndt = - beta * Sn * In
    dIndt = beta * Sn * In - gamma * In
    dRndt = gamma * In


    return dSdt, dIdt, dRdt, dSndt, dIndt, dRndt
res = solve_ivp(fun=deriv, t_span = (0, 80), y0=y_0, args=(beta, gamma, regn), max_step=1)

S, I, R, Sn, In, Rn = res.y

fig = plt.figure(facecolor="w", figsize=(6, 6))
ax = fig.add_subplot(111, axisbelow=True)

ax.plot(res.t, I, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, linestyle="dotted", label="Infectious (0.3 pct constant REGN)")
ax.plot(res.t, In, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.5, lw=2, linestyle="dashed", label="Infectious (no REGN)")


ax.fill_between(res.t, I, In, color=COLORS["I"], alpha=0.25)

ax.set_xlabel('Time [d]')
ax.set_ylabel("Population fraction")
ax.set_ylim(0, 0.6)
ax.grid(b=True, which='major', c='w', lw=2, ls='-')

legend = ax.legend()
legend.get_frame().set_alpha(0.5)
plt.legend(title='', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.4), loc="lower center", ncol=2, frameon=False)

fig.subplots_adjust(bottom=0.25)
plt.show()
